summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PAM concert discovery app iteration 3 focusing on color scheme changes and Spotify OAuth iframe fix. Backend APIs working perfectly (12/12 tests passed). Frontend successfully implemented color scheme change from amber/teal to #DED5EB/#380E75 purple/lavender theme. Spotify OAuth iframe fix confirmed in code with window.top.location.href implementation. All core UI flows functional with correct purple branding throughout.
passed_tests: GET /api/ health check returns 'PAM API is running'
POST /api/users creates user successfully
GET /api/users/{user_id} retrieves user data correctly
PUT /api/users/{user_id} updates user fields
GET /api/spotify/login returns valid Spotify OAuth URL with correct state parameter
POST /api/favorites creates and returns favorite concert
GET /api/favorites/{user_id} returns user favorites list
DELETE /api/favorites/{favorite_id} removes favorite successfully
POST /api/share/create correctly rejects when no taste profile exists (400)
GET /api/share/{invalid_id} returns 404 for nonexistent shares
Error handling for invalid user creation (422) and nonexistent users (404)
Landing page renders with correct purple (#380E75) PAM branding
Landing page displays 3 feature cards with proper styling
Landing page hero content and subtitle display correctly
Landing page Get Started button navigates to /onboarding
Color scheme verification: No amber (#f59e0b) or teal (#14b8a6) colors detected
Color scheme verification: Purple (#380E75) and lavender (#DED5EB) colors implemented throughout
Onboarding page has purple progress bar and Continue button styling
Onboarding step 1 form validation (name/email) working correctly
Onboarding step 2 sliders (concerts/budget) functional with value display
Onboarding Connect Spotify button ready and properly styled
Dashboard displays correct user greeting and navigation elements
Dashboard shows appropriate 'Connect Spotify' state when no taste profile exists
Dashboard Discover/Saved tabs correctly hidden until taste profile created
Dashboard logout and share buttons present when appropriate
Share page error state displays correct error message for invalid share IDs
Share page error state has working purple CTA button that navigates to home
Spotify OAuth iframe fix confirmed: window.top.location.href implementation in code

success_percentage.backend: 100% (12/12 tests passed - all endpoints working perfectly)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (color scheme successfully changed, all UI flows working, Spotify OAuth iframe fix implemented)
